history.proof: intros n m p Hp H. strivial use: Z.mul_le_mono_pos_l.

ctx: intros n m p Hp H.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall n m p : Z, 0 < p -> n * p <= m * p -> n <= m" on hypothesis of type "p * n <= p * m".

ctx: intros n m p Hp H.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall n m p : Z, p > 0 -> n * p <= m * p -> n <= m" on hypothesis of type "Z.pos (p * p0) <= Z.pos (p * p1)".

ctx: intros n m p Hp H.
exceptions.exn: In environment H2 : forall n m p : Z, 0 < p -> n * p <= m * p -> n <= m H1 : forall n m p : Z, p > 0 -> n * p <= m * p -> n <= m p0, p1, p : positive H : Z.pos (p * p0) <= Z.pos (p * p1) Unable to unify "Z.pos (p * p0) <= Z.pos (p * p1)" with "Z.pos p0 <= Z.pos p1".

original: intros n m p Hp H. apply Zmult_lt_0_le_reg_r in H. apply Zmult_le_reg_r in H. apply H.
